title: Game modes
body:
Please bring back the rotation game modes... I want to play blood moon, one for all, URF, poro king etc...
Just turn it on and leave it like that.. Don't make changes to the game modes, items etc every patch.. Just leave it as it is...
Some game mode like blood moon don't even have a lot of champions....

I don't know much about game development but if its not very hard to keep it on please do it
A game of blood moon may even remove the tilt soo..
Please Riot pleaseee...

replies.body:
urf is a once/twice a year thing; and they have it that way because while it does bring people in...it also chases more away

as for other game modes; they will happen when they happen
